answers.answer: "I get up in the middle of the night totally out of it like if I am in a trance"Test your glucose level at this time, or have someone do it for you if you feel incapable. It's possible that you are experiencing hypoglycemia from too much bedtime insulin. Then, the next morning inform your doctor of your findings. Best of health

question: I take novelin in the day without a problem, at night I also take it but I get up in the middle of the night totally out of it like if I am in a trance what could this be due to?
title: diabetes
